changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadata.dataset_version SET version_id = to_char(date_created, 'YYYYMMDD') WHERE version_id IS NULL OR char_length(regexp_replace(version_id, E'\\s+', '', 'g')) = 0;

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE metadata.dataset_version ALTER COLUMN version_id SET NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: sgf
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE metadata.dataset_version ADD CONSTRAINT unq_dataset_version_datasetid_versionid UNIQUE (dataset_id, version_id);
